source.network_wifiNetworksNone_description: Move closer to a Wi-Fi router to get better reception.
source.network_invalidAuth_description: Check the details you need to enter to connect to this network (such as passwords), and try connecting again.
source.network_invalidAuth_description_fromSave: It seems that the details needed to connect (such as passwords) have changed since you last connected. Try connecting again.
source.network_connectionError_description: Check the network configuration and hardware to see if it is working properly, and try connecting again.
source.l10n_summary: Change language, region and keyboard settings
source.l10n_changeMessage: The new language that you choose will be applied on apps once they have been relaunched.
source.l10n_input_layout_description: You can add multiple keyboard layouts to easily switch between different languages and input modes when writing text.
source.personalisation_summary: Change the current background and theme
source.a11y_summary: Customise visual, auditory and navigatory access
source.a11y_switch_summary: Full control and navigation with at least one switch
source.a11y_switch_description: Switch Navigation allows you to access and navigate your device by using one or more switches — such as push buttons, foot pedals, sip-and-puff switches and more.
source.a11y_switch_disableDialog_description: You will not be able to navigate using a switch until Switch Navigation is enabled again.
source.interaction_summary: Choose how you wish to interact with LiveG
source.interaction_checkForUpdates: Automatically check for system updates in the background
source.interaction_checkForUpdates_description: Your device won't update automatically without your consent, but it is recommended to enable this option so that you can be notified when a new version or security update of LiveG OS comes out.
source.interaction_researchTelemetry_descriptio: When enabled, information about how you use your device (such as what apps you have installed and what system settings you have enabled) will be sent to LiveG so that improvements to LiveG OS can be made based on your own usage.

Cumulative statistical results produced from the data collected as part of a large sample of devices may be shared publicly in the interest of openness. Research objectives may change between system updates, and you can choose whether you wish to be notified of such changes.
source.interaction_researchTelemetry_notifyChan: Be notified when research objectives change
source.interaction_privacyInfo_description: The information that LiveG collects from your device is used to help LiveG to determine what improvements to LiveG OS should be made or prioritised. When you have these interaction options enabled, any data sent from your device will not contain anything that would reveal your personal information. You can opt in or out of these options at any time.
source.interaction_privacyInfo_link: Find out more about your privacy when using LiveG OS
source.updates_summary: Install updates that bring improvements to your device
